properties.areaDesc: Hatteras Island; Ocracoke Island; East Carteret; Southern Craven
properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued February 19 at 9:45PM EST until February 21 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in
low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways.

* WHERE...Areas along the southern Pamlico Sound, lower Neuse
River and adjacent tidal creeks. Also along the soundside of
Ocracoke Island and Hatteras Island south of Buxton.

* WHEN...From Thursday evening to Friday evening.

* IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only
isolated road closures expected.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THURSDAY TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY
